mapper.select: select rental_id as rentalId, item_id as itemId, user_id as userId, store_id as storeId, rent_date as rentDate, return_date as returnDate, act_return_date as actReturnDate from rental_list where user_id = #{userId} order by rental_id desc;
mapper.insert: insert into rental_list (item_id, user_id, store_id, rent_date, return_date) values (#{itemId}, #{userId}, #{storeId}, #{rentDate}, #{returnDate});
mapper.select: select store_id as storeId, store_name as storeName, tel_no as telNo, open_time as openTime, close_time as closeTime, latitude, longitude, address from store_list;
select tel_no as telNo, open_time as openTime, close_time as closeTime, latitude, longitude, address from item_list where item_id = #{itemId};

select rt.item_id as itemId, ifnull(avg(format(truncate(rv.star_rate, 1), 1)), 0) as avgRate, count(1) as reviewCount, if(exists (select 1 from review_list trv inner join rental_list trt on trv.rental_id = trt.rental_id where trt.item_id = #{itemId} and trv.user_id = #{userId}), 'Y', 'N') as reviewYn from review_list rv inner join rental_list rt on rv.rental_id = rt.rental_id where rt.item_id = #{itemId} group by rt.item_id;

select rv.review_id as reviewId, rv.user_id as userId, (select user_name from user_list where user_id = rv.user_id) as userName, rv.content, date_format(rv.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as createDate, date_format(rv.modify_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as modifyDate, rv.star_rate as starRate, if(rv.user_id = #{userId}, 'Y', 'N') as writerYn from review_list rv inner join rental_list rt on rv.rental_id = rt.rental_id where rt.item_id = #{itemId} order by rv.review_id desc;
select if(exists (select 1 from rental_list where rental_id = #{rentalId} and user_id = #{userId}), 'Y', 'N') as rentalUserYn from dual;
select if(exists (select 1 from review_list where review_id = #{reviewId} and user_id = #{userId}), 'Y', 'N') as reviewUserYn from dual;
mapper.insert: insert into review_list (rental_id, user_id, content, create_date, modify_date, star_rate) values (#{rental.rentalId}, #{userId}, #{rental.content}, now(), now(), #{rental.starRate});
mapper.update: update review_list set content = #{content}, star_rate = #{starRate}, modify_date = now() where review_id = #{reviewId}
